mapper.select: update INSBPayResult set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},status = #{status},insSerialNo = #{insSerialNo},paySerialNo = #{paySerialNo},amount = #{amount},transDate = #{transDate},payResult = #{payResult},orderState = #{orderState} where bizId = #{bizId}

update INSBPayresult set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},status = #{status},bizId = #{bizId},insSerialNo = #{insSerialNo},paySerialNo = #{paySerialNo},amount = #{amount},transDate = #{transDate},payResult = #{payResult},orderState = #{orderState},payResultDesc = #{payResultDesc},payflowno = #{payflowno} where id = #{id}
